name: Samaras, Georgios
description: Ruled out of 20/12 game against QPR. Returned to training on 18/12 after being granted a week off for personal reasons.

name: Osman, Leon
description: Rated a doubt for 20/12 trip to Southampton. Ruled out "for a while" by Roberto Martinez on 30/12.

name: Cisse, Papiss
description: Set to serve a three-match ban for violent conduct. Will also depart for international duties with Senegal in January to participate in African Cup of Nations.

name: Huddlestone, Tom
description: Serving a four-match ban. Huddlestone earned a one-match ban after collecting his fifth yellow card of the season during the 13/12 game against Chelsea. He then received an additional three-match ban

name: Toure, Yaya
description: Missed 28/12 game against Burnley with problem.

name: de Jong, Siem
description: Club confirmed on 5/9 he is expected to be out for a number of months.

name: di Maria, Angel
description: Missed 26/12 game against Newcastle with problem.

name: Odemwingie, Peter
description: Forced off during 30/8 game against Man City. Ruled out for the "foreseeable future" on 1/9.

name: Diame, Mohamed
description: Forced off during 3/12 clash with Everton due to recurrence of previous injury. Confirmed on 13/12 that Diame had been put in a brace for at least a month.

name: Aguero, Sergio
description: Sustained in the encounter with Everton on 6/12 which saw him forced off on 7 minutes. Ruled out for 4-6 weeks by Manuel Pellegrini on 9/12.

name: Pienaar, Steven
description: Still a couple of weeks away from match fitness, confirmed Roberto Martinez on 30/12.

name: Bridcutt, Liam
description: Sustained in the 0-0 draw with Aston Villa on 28/12 which saw him forced off on 19 minutes.

name: Robertson, Andrew
description: Missed the 3-1 win at Sunderland through injury.

name: Sessegnon, Stephane
description: Subbed off during 28/12 game against Stoke with problem.

name: Ulloa, Leonardo
description: Sustained in the 1-0 win at Hull on 28/12 which saw him forced off on 54 minutes.

name: Skrtel, Martin
description: Serving a one-match ban having picked up his fifth booking of the season in the 4-1 win over Swansea on 29/12. He will miss the home encounter with Leicester to return to contention for the FA Cup thi

name: Schneiderlin, Morgan
description: Serving a one-match ban for the red card received against Chelsea on 28/12. He will miss 1/1 game against Arsenal to return to contention for the FA Cup third round tie with Ipswich on 4/1.

name: Krkic, Bojan
description: Sustained in the 1-0 win at Everton on Boxing Day which saw him replaced on 67 minutes. Started against West Brom on 28/12 but was withdrawn on 77 minutes.

name: Larsson, Sebastian
description: Sustained in the 0-0 draw with Aston Villa on 28/12 which saw him forced off on 57 minutes. Post-match, Gus Poyet confirmed some ligament damage but suggested that he would take "a few days" to recove

name: Wilshere, Jack
description: Sustained in the encounter with Man United on 22/11 which saw him forced off on 55 minutes. Ruled out for three months on 27/11 after undergoing surgery.

name: Blind, Daley
description: Forced off during Holland's win over Latvia on 16/11. Louis van Gaal confirmed on 20/11 the midfielder could be sidelined for up to six months.

name: Ireland, Stephen
description: Rated a doubt for 22/12 visit of Chelsea.

name: Johnson, Glen
description: Sustained in the encounter with Man United on 14/12 which saw him forced off on 24 minutes.

name: Flanagan, Jon
description: Sent home from club's summer tour of US with problem. Ruled out "for a number of months" on 18/9 after undergoing surgery.

name: Jedinak, Mile
description: Is set to play in Asian Cup for Australia. The tournament starts on January 9, with group stages ending on January 20 and the final taking place on January 31. Jedinak will miss at least GW20-22, then

name: Bent, Darren
description: Moved to Brighton on one-month loan on 26/11

name: Gibson, Darron
description: Withdrew from Republic of Ireland squad on 15/11 due to problem.

name: Jagielka, Phil
description: Forced off during 26/12 game against Stoke.

name: Pocognoli, Sebastien
description: Missed 28/12 trip to Stoke due to problem.

name: Fellaini, Marouane
description: Set to miss remainder of festive fixtures after suffering injury in training.

name: Welbeck, Danny
description: Rated a doubt for 1/1 trip to Southampton.

name: Upson, Matthew
description: Nigel Pearson revealed on 12/8 the defender is set to undergo surgery and will be out "for a while".

name: Sandro
description: Sustained in the 1-0 defeat to Newcastle on 22/11. Ruled out until after Christmas on 25/11.

name: Negredo, Alvaro
description: Joined Valencia on season-long loan deal

name: Rodriguez, Jay
description: Sustained in the 4-1 defeat to Man City on 5/4 which saw him stretchered off in the first half. Club confirmed on 7/4 he is expected to be sidelined for around six months.

name: Taylor, Matty
description: Missed 13/9 game against Crystal Palace with problem. Underwent surgery on 16/10 and will be out for foreseeable future.

name: Boruc, Artur
description: Joined Bournemouth on loan from 19/9 until January.

name: Ramsey, Aaron
description: Withdrawn at half-time during 9/12 game against Galatasaray. Ramsey sat out of the Emirates meeting with Newcastle on 13/12 with Wenger also ruling him out of the trip to Liverpool on 21/12.

name: Delph, Fabian
description: Serving a three-match ban for the red card received against Sunderland on 28/12 for serious foul play. He will miss league matches with Crystal Palace and Leicester City, plus the FA Cup tie with Blac

name: Yanga-Mbiwa, Mapou
description: Joined Roma on season-long loan deal.

name: Snodgrass, Robert
description: Withdrawn on 40 minutes in the clash with QPR on 16/8.  Steve Bruce revealed on 20/8 Snodgrass could be out for up to six months with a dislocated kneecap.

name: Arteta, Mikel
description: Withdrawn during 26/11 game against Borussia Dortmund with problem. Post-match, Arsene Wenger admitted the injury "looked quite serious".

name: Kompany, Vincent
description: Sustained in the encounter with Leicester on 13/12 which saw him forced off on 75 minutes. Manuel Pellegrini stated on 26/12 that he may be fit to return against Burnley on 28/12.

name: Chamakh, Marouane
description: Sustained in the encounter with Stoke on 13/12 which saw him forced off on 75 minutes.

name: Krul, Tim
description: Picked up problem in training ahead of 29/11 game against West Ham. Ruled out "for the next four or five games" by Alan Pardew on 29/11.

name: Nani
description: Joined Sporting Lisbon on season-long loan deal

name: Lovren, Dejan
description: Forced off during 17/12 cup clash with Bournemouth.

name: Valencia, Antonio
description: Forced off during 28/12 game against Spurs with problem.

name: Cork, Jack
description: Forced off early during 3/12 game against Arsenal.

name: Ozil, Mesut
description: Reports on 8/10 suggest he could be sidelined for 10-12 weeks.

name: Dzeko, Edin
description: Sustained a recurrence of his previous calf injury in the warm-up to the encounter with Leicester on 13/12.

name: Montero, Jefferson
description: Forced off early during 26/12 game against Aston Villa. Garry Monk confirmed post-match that the player would undergo scans to assess the extent of the injury. Ruled out for a month on 29/12.

name: Murray, Glenn
description: Joined Reading on loan until January

name: Sturridge, Daniel
description: Set for scans after sustaining problem during training on 18/11. Club confirmed the following day he is set for another period on the sidelines.

name: Herrera, Ander
description: Missed the 1-1 draw with Aston Villa on 20/12 with a "little" injury. Confirmed on 28/12 that he could be in line to push for a recall prior to the New Year.

name: Olsson, Jonas
description: Expected to return in mid January after undergoing surgery.

name: Allen, Joe
description: Ruled out of 26/12 game against Burnley.

name: Hernandez, Javier
description: Joined Real Madrid in season-long loan deal.

name: Dawson, Michael
description: Sustained in the encounter with Chelsea on 13/12 which saw him forced off on ten minutes.

name: Senderos, Philippe
description: Picked up problem during training for Swiss national side on 11/11 and will miss the upcoming clash with Lithuania and Poland.

name: McCarthy, James
description: Withdrawn during 28/12 defeat at Newcastle due to problem.

name: Bardsley, Phil
description: Missed the 1-0 win over Everton.

name: Rojo, Marcos
description: Missed the encounter with Liverpool on 14/12 with an injury sustained in training.

name: Stones, John
description: Sustained in the 1-0 defeat to Stoke on 26/12.

name: Westwood, Ashley
description: Stretchered off in the encounter with Leicester City on 7/12.

name: Cleverley, Tom
description: Sustained in the 0-0 draw with Sunderland on 28/12.

name: Tomkins, James
description: Serving a one-match ban after picking up his fifth booking of the season in the 2-1 defeat to Arsenal on 28/12. He will miss the encounter with West Brom on 1/1 to return to contention on 6/1 for the

name: Morrison, James
description: Subbed off during 28/12 game against Stoke with problem.

name: Howard, Tim
description: Unlikely to face Newcastle on 28/12, according to Roberto Martinez. Ruled out for 5-6 weeks on 30/12.

name: Sidwell, Steve
description: Sustained in the 1-0 defeat at Liverpool on 29/11 which saw him forced off on 22 minutes.

name: Giroud, Olivier
description: Serving a three-match ban for the red card received against QPR on 26/12 for violent conduct. He will miss league matches with West Ham and Southampton, plus the FA Cup third round tie with Hull City

name: Ramirez, Gaston
description: Sustained in the 1-0 defeat to Leicester which saw him withdrawn at half-time.

name: Clyne, Nathaniel
description: Missed 28/12 game against Chelsea with problem. Ronald Koeman confirmed the injury post-match and indicated that he would face up to 10 days on the sidelines as a result.

name: van Ginkel, Marco
description: Joined AC Milan on season-long loan

name: Fernando
description: Serving a one-match ban after picking up his fifth yellow card of the season in the 2-2 draw with Burnley on 28/12. He will miss the home encounter with Sunderland on 1/1 to return to contention for t

name: Santon, Davide
description: Stepped up recovery from long-term injury with 60-minute appearance for reserves on 30/12.

name: Anichebe, Victor
description: Replaced during 6/12 game against Hull due to problem.

name: Kozak, Libor
description: Ruled out for rest of the season by club on 2/1. Reported in March that he should return to contention for Villa's pre-season in July.

name: Luna, Antonio
description: Joined Verona on season-long loan deal.

name: Clark, Ciaran
description: Subbed off during 28/12 game against Sunderland.

name: Januzaj, Adnan
description: Set to miss 28/12 trip to Spurs with virus.
